original_text: Then they brought in some men to say bad things about Stephen. The things that these men said were not true. They said about Stephen, ‘This man is always saying bad things about the temple. He says bad things against God's Law.
korean_text: 거짓 증인들을 세우니 이르되 이 사람이 이 거룩한 곳과 율법을 거슬러 말하기를 마지 아니하는도다

sentences.original_text: Then they brought in some men
to say bad things about Stephen
The things that these men said were not true
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들이 말한 것들은 사실이 아니었습니다

sentences.original_text: 'This man is always saying bad things about the temple
sentences.korean_translation: '이 사람은 항상 성전에 대해 나쁜 말을 합니다

sentences.original_text: He says bad things against God's Law.'
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 하나님의 율법에 반대되는 나쁜 말을 합니다.'
